Context: The Facilities Management Department provides a range of services including space planning, design, building construction, renovations, engineering, maintenance, energy management, housekeeping, furnishings, grounds maintenance, and transportation at all George Brown College campuses: St. James Campus, Casa Loma Campus, Toronto Metropolitan University Campus, and Waterfront Campus. The department is committed to exceeding customer expectations through excellence in asset management, leadership, and professionalism, adding value to the community and educational experience. They promote a safe, clean, and secure environment for continuous learning and individual growth. Services provided by the department can be learned about in the Service Guide. For facilities-related requests, contact FacilitiesServices@georgebrown.ca. George Brown College can be reached at 416-415-2000 or TTY: 1-877-515-5559. Email inquiries can be sent to ask.george@georgebrown.ca. The department's social media hub can also be visited. The information contained in the website is subject to change without notice and should not be viewed as a representation, offer, or warranty. Students are responsible for verifying George Brown College fee requirements.
